Event.name: Activity_ready_state
Event.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is in an initial state, before beginning to be involved in the <fen>Activity</fen>, but all pre-conditions for performance of the <fen>Activity</fen> have been satisfied. In many cases, the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is an intentional agent, but there are other uses in which the agent is deprofiled, and the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is an entity which is essential to the <fen>Activity</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Activity</fen> may be indicated by a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> which stands in for the <fen>Activity</fen>. This <fen>Salient_entity</fen> may also be an intentional agent, but need not be.
<ex><fex name="pro">She</fex> <m>'s</m> not <t>ready</t> ! <fex name="act">DNI</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="pro">He</fex> <m>'s</m> <t>ready</t> <fex name="act">to talk</fex> , I think .</ex> <ex><m>Is</m> <fex name="pro">the UK government</fex> <t>ready</t> <fex name="act">to do a u-turn on passport-ID cards</fex> ?</ex> <ex>Check and see if <fex name="pro">Sal</fex> <m>is</m> <t>ready</t> <fex name="sal">for the bathtub</fex> .</ex> <ex><fex name="pro">The world</fex> <m>is</m> finally <t>prepared</t> <fex name="sal">for him</fex> !</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Protagonist
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> in the initial state of an activity.</def-root>

Arg.name: Activity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
<ex>The students were finally <t>ready</t> <fex name="act">to take the exam</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Salient_entity
Arg.definition:
<def-root>An entity which stands in metonymically for the <fen>Activity</fen>.
<ex>Are you <t>ready</t> <fex name="sal">for a baby</fex> ?</ex> <ex>I 'm <t>ready</t> <fex name="sal">for the eggs</fex> now .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is ready.
<ex>He looks like he 's <t>ready</t> <fex name="tim">now</fex> .</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Result
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state or event that follows due to the ready state. </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The length of time that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> remains capable of the <fen>Activity</fen> without beginning it.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: ready.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: in a suitable state for an activity or situation; fully prepared.

lexUnit.name: prepared.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: be ready for some activity.
